data.title: EEA Scientific Committee
data.meta_description: EEA Scientific CommitteeProgramme ChairsGhazala Azmat (Sciences Po) and Benjamin Moll (London School of Economics)
data.text:
Programme Chairs

Ghazala Azmat (Sciences Po) and Benjamin Moll (London School of Economics)

Field Coordinators:

Applied Macroeconometrics

Lead: Michele Lenza (ECB)

Graders: Marta Banbura, Carlos Montes-Galdon, Francesca Monti

Applied Microeconomics

Leads: Arnaud Chevalier (Royal Holloway, University of London), N. Meltem Daysal (University of Copenhagen) and Christopher Rauh (University of Cambridge)

Graders: Manuel Bagues, Ian Burn, Ana Costa-Ramon, Natalia Danzer, Ben Elsner, Gabrielle Fack, Francesco Fasani, Nagore Iriberri, Ezgi Kaya, Nadine Ketel, Luigi Minale, Julie Riise, Clara Santamaria, Bettina Siflinger, Jan Stuhler, Alexandros Theloudis, Alexander Willen, Miriam Wüst, Jonathan Zhang and Weilong Zhang

Behavioural & Experimental

Leads: Elif Kubilay (University of Essex) and Kirsten Rohde (Maastrict University)

Graders: Aurelien Baillon, Elena Cettolin, Amma Panin, Jan Potters, Abu Siddique, Jan Stoop, Sigrid Suetens, Matthias Weber, Peter Werner and Dennie Van Dolder

Development

Lead: Abhijeet Singh (Stockholm School of Economics), and Vittorio Bassi (University of Southern California)

Graders: Selim Gulesci, Simon Franklin, Martina Kirchberger, Elisa Macchi, Ben Marx, Suanna Oh, Federico Rossi, David Schonholzer, Andreas Stegmann, Lore Vanderwalle and Anna Vitali

Econometrics

Lead: Clément de Chaisemartin (Sciences Po)

Graders: Arturas Juodis, Soonwoo Kwon, Laura Liu and Davide Viviano

Economic History

Lead: Elena Esposito (ESOMAS, Department of Economics, University of Torino, Collegio Carlo Alberto, Affiliate and CEPR)

Graders: Mattia Bertazzini, Johannes Buggle, Catherine Guirkinger

Economic Theory

Lead: Daniele Condorelli (University of Warwick)

Graders: Leonie Baumann, Nina Bobkova, Andrew Ellis, Deniz Kattwinkel, Ludovic Renou and Christopher Sandmann

Environmental Economics

Lead: Matti Liski (Aalto University)

Graders: Lint Barrage, Tessa Bold, Antoine Dechezleprêtre, Natalia Fabra, Mirabelle Muuls, Morten Olsen, Katheline Schubert, Inge van den Bijgaart and Ulrich Wagner

Finance

Leads: Frederico Belo (INSEAD) and Olivier Dessaint (INSEAD)

Graders: Toni Ahnert, Pat Akey, Laurent Bach, Alexandre Corhay, Jérôme Dugast, Sergei Glebkin, Andrey Golubov, Marco Grotteria, Camille Hebert, Jessica Jeffers, Ambrus Kecskés, John Kuong, Jun Li, Nicola Limodio, Pierre Mabille, Tatyana Marchuk, Roberto Marfe, Clemens Otto, Juliana Salomao, Christoph Schiller, Eva Schliephake, Daniel Schmidt, Lin Shen, Andrea Vedolin, Guillaume Vuillemey and Bart Yueshen

History of Economic Thought

Lead: Estrella Trincado (Universidad Complutense de Madrid)

Graders: Muriel Dal Pont Legrand, Denis Melnik and Cosimo Perrotta

Industrial Organisation

Lead: Heski Bar-Isaac (Rotman School of Management, University of Toronto)

Graders: Ozlem Bedre Defolie, Florian Englmaier, Natalia Fabra, Ying Fan, Chiara Farronato, Seba Fleitas and Gerard Llobet

International

Leads: Felix Tintelnot, University of Chicago, and Liliana Varela, London School of Economics

Graders: Laura Castillo-Martinez, Ambrogio Cesa-Bianchi, Fabian Eckert, Simon Fuchs, Anna Gumpert, Julian Hinz, Ayumu Ken Kikkawa, Haishi “Harry” Li, Diego Perez, Felipe Saffie, Hernan Seoane and Feodora Teti

Labour

Leads: Alexia Delfino (Bocconi University) and Roland Rathelot (ENSAE, IP Paris, and CREST)

Graders: Maria Balgova, Piera Bello, Miguel Espinosa, Christina Felfe, Tommaso Frattini, Laura Khoury, Rune Majlund Vejlin, Clement Malgouyres, Franck Malherbet, Paul Muller, Matteo Paradisi, Michele Pellizzari, Erik Plug, David Seim and Josef Sigurdsson

Law and Economics

Lead: Matthieu Chemin (McGill University)

Graders: Elliott Ash and Betul Simsek

Macroeconomics

Leads: Corina Boar (NYU), Edouard Challe (Paris School of Economics), Moritz Kuhn (University of Mannheim) and Vincent Sterk (UCL)

Graders: Hassan Afrouzi, Titan Alon, Andres Blanco, Benjamin Born, Björn Brügemann, Carlos Carrillo-Tudela, Fernando Cirelli, Fabrice Collard, Kyle Dempsey, Keshav Dogra, Thomas Drechsel, Georg Duernecker, Gaetano Gaballo, Chryssi Giannitsarou, John Grigsby, Andreas Gulyas, Rafael Guntin, Rustam Jamilov, Diego Känzig, Federico Kochen, Lorenz Kueng, Kieran Larkin, Ralph Lütticke, Joseba Martinez, Davide Melcangi, Sara Moreira, Gernot Mueller, Jane Olmstead-Rumsey, Facundo Piguillem, Marta Prato, Lukasz Rachel, Xavier Ragot, Pontus Rendahl, Andreas Schaab and Ludo Visschers

Political Economy

Lead: Laurent Bouton (Georgetown University)

Graders: Filipe Campante, Micael Castanheira, Garance Genicot, Gabriele Gratton, Ethan Kaplan, Aniol Llorente-Saguer, Allison Stashko and Dimitrios Xefteris

Public
